attributes.action: ensure that no food from cloned animals is allowed in the UK for human or animal consumption now or in the future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC reported today (15th January 08) that America's Food & Drug Administration has given the green light to selling food from cloned animals.  A ban on the use of such food in the UK is urged to prevent both the import of entire meat products and cloned meat as ingredients in other products.
